casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sabin Thain SEGERS. No. 585P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of October 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
